#### Description 

Widget render function for use in Shiny

#### Usage
<pre><code>
renderHighchart(expr, env = parent.frame(), quoted = FALSE)
renderHighchart2(expr, env = parent.frame(), quoted = FALSE)
</code></pre>

#### Arguments 
* ``expr``: A highchart expression.
* ``env``: A enviorment.
* ``quoted``: A boolean value.
